author: Lisa Mahajan-Cusack
text: I am currently in the infancy stage of my PhD dissertation looking at the extent communities are utilizing social media platforms to make government more effective and efficient.  More specifically, how social media enhances citizen engagement, increases transparency, and fosters collaboration with citizens. There is a wide spectrum of implementation and types of platforms used. I am looking for recommendations of communities which have an established track record of social media use, and are willing to share their expereinces. More like "best practices" in the area of social media.
title: Social media and local government
